articles.content: Netflix / Via giphy.comIf their emotions were in actual roller coaster form, it would be the scariest roller coaster in the world.

articles.author: Ellie Phillips
articles.title: James Corden dresses as The Weeknd and covers his face in bandages for a Super Bowl skit - Daily Mail
articles.description: The I Can't Feel My Face hitmaker, 30, appeared to be preparing for his performance in the sketch, and failed to recognise the Gavin and Stacey actor, 42
articles.content:
The Weeknd was surrounded by hundreds of masked dancers during his sensational COVID-friendly Super Bowl LV halftime show in Tampa Florida on Sunday. 
And following suit, James Corden, 42, dressed a… [+3669 chars]
